Oh god I love this place
No matter you are Buddhist or not, you will be impressed because of the story of the building.
The price is expensive but it worth.
Highly recommend you to hire a tour guide to introduce the story behind this building 
(They will also take you to good spot to take pic)
Wonderful place to know the historical of Mataram & nice place to shoot the picture

Big temple, beautiful, majestic place. It is quite exhausting cause u have to climb many stairs but when u reach the top it feels amazing. There's also local market that sells souvenirs and many more.
Magical and peaceful place ever to calm ourselves with the fresh morning air.

Very beautiful monument which seemed daunting to climb, but we had a great guide who took us through all the levels in an interesting manner and relaxed pace. Enjoyed listening to the history. A must visit. The restaurant Manohara was great too !
After 14 years, happy to be back again

Instagram worthy location.
My driver took me to the wrong area but it was cheaper to see.the sunrise from there.
Here the package for sunrise is quite costly. But good view and great ambience too over here.
The stairs steep btw so do becareful other than that here is amazing.
If you love temple this would be one pf the location to really go for it.

One of the most amazing temples I have ever been in! This temple is so amazing, no wondering people from all over the world flock just to get a glimpse and be inside here. It's a bit crowded, it would be ideal if there were less people, but it's amazing all the same!
Amazing size, one of the 7 wonder of the world.
A good place to go for vacation the place was very awesome

The temple is so Big and cool. I imagined how hard they build the temple. It's so good. Especially the Buddha statue inside every bell. I'm amazed with the ambiance or the view and serenity of the place
It is magnificent, seriouly! Avoid the weekends.

I always love this place but the amount of tourist makes the place feels like a typical tourist spot instead of a temple. Somehow it lost it vibes.

I got heat strokes too there, almost passed out.

Still a very nice destination for an educarive family vacation. Providing various kind of transportation inside the entrance gate for those who are not able to walk through to the temple or wheelchair for elderly (of course with extra cost)
This place is so historical .. very artistic i love it

I'm very like it because of a temple borobudur so look scenery that Beautiful and Beautiful creatures ,so a lot of history that  we unknown be knew about history that there in the temple borobudur a located D. I. Y Yogyakarta. I'm very proud be person indonesian. I love Indonesian I love Yogyakarta.
Amazing place for our holidays. Must visit!
The Place which built during 750ad for Buddhist religion. Every year there will be a team from all over the world will come for the Lama Gangchen Rinpoche Self Healing & Long Life puja

Visited here with my family in school vacation and it was absolutely very crowded. Crowded was acceptable but the worst,  the management of the parking lot was awful. The management closed the entrance gate and directed us to park the car outside and far from the entrance. It supposed to be our excited experirnce...
The great budha tample in indonesia
Arrange a driver from town to take you to Borobudor in time for sunrise. The early wake up is completely worth it! The temple is peaceful and stunning, enjoy walking around and exploring the details.
Very nice and unique place. If you are in Yogyakarta you need to visit this place!
A historical temple in Indonesia which is one of the world's amazing place
Amazing temple and structure, one of need to visit place in Indonesia
Steeped history. Picturesque. World heritage site.
Very nice place of attraction to tourist.  Climbing to the top of the temple is a good exercise for the body. Foreigners are made to pay more than the Indonesia citizens. Gift items are available.

It is good for visit.Nice wiew.
Best way is to come near the closing time for not much crowd

Nice place and this one is the biggest budha temple in the world. Is best place to visit with your family and beloved. If you come better you prepare drink and your spirit, coz so many person come here, especially when Holiday. So this place very crowded,
UNESCO heritage temple. Serene and peaceful. A must for visitors to jogjakarta
Wonderfull and memorable place. Going better and clean
I always love historical sites. So if you do love historical sites and have a chance to visit, you better visit this place
Wonderful Temple that I proud to be Indonesian. Huge and beautiful Candi (temple). Please take care of our Heritage by obeying the instructions at the location.

Sitting on top of borobudur in silent morning is the best moment i had during vesakh. When not many peoples there during holiday. I can feel sun shine and gentle wind touch my skin. To realize that how wonderful this world
This place is one of the greatest place I've ever visited. What a history behind this beautiful temple. Great architecture for the old building. I wish I can visit Borobudur again next time!

This is a must for domestic or international tourist. The mistic, ambience, atmosphere, everything you want to know about temple in the past, great view, and the local government really took care with preservation, the staff really helpful. Really glad to be here, don't forget to visit the museum, it is a must to learn the history
In this place, everything i like. So amazing place, i will come back back again.
Borobudur is a beautiful place and a stunning place to walk through. Skip on your hotel's breakfast and join for their all you can eat buffet included in your very pricey ticket.

The place is best when you want to learn all about Buddhism. Please wear comfortable shoes for climbing the steps and don't forget to bring water and a cap. I would also recommend that you wear light long sleeve shirt to avoid sunburn.

If you bought ticket via traveloka, you should redeem in international locket. Easy access, better experience, nice service, no queue.
You better came not on peak season to get better pictures. Bring your hat, umbrella, sunglasses, and drinks

A historical construction wonder from 1200 years ago. Indonesia's most visited tourist destination. Mornings are cool and comfortable. The place is well maintained and well organized. A great sunrise photography opportunity. Go early before 4.30am and get a strategic spot facing East by 5am. The sky starts getting light around 5.10am even though official sunrise time (September) is around 5.40am. 
Well worth a visit to the world's largest Buddhist complex.
Nice temple.. you have to prepare your fit condition to walk. Amazing 7 wonder

Nice place with a good view and environtment.
Perfect for photoshoot and avoid rainy day
One of A UNESCO world heritage sites in Indonesia and also the largest Temple in the World
Nice temple.. you have to prepare your fit condition to walk. Amazing 7 wonder

A total change from the visit 1996. Still preferred the old version  when we were able to be transported to very close to the site. Too commercial, and not enough directional signs to guide tourists to the exit.

A huge and imposing temple. You could spend the whole day deciphering the relief images as a story book on the wall. Although you will probably spend more time being photographed by the locals if you are a bule (white foreigner) it can be fun if you are in no hurry and enjoy meeting people.
One of UNESCO World Heritage sight a must visit if you are ever in Yogyakarta or Magelang...just a short drive and highly recommend to visit during the sun rise..it's breathtaking..

Spectacular experience. 
Entrance fee Rph 500k includes free scrumptious buffet breakfast.
One of the best place I have visited. Great feeling....

Temple that really show the history of Indonesia. There are really many tourists around. If you want a good view of the sunrise it's suggested to go as soon as its opened. There is a cafeteria nearby which they serve breakfast. Food is ok, price is included in when you buy the entrance ticket.

Yes it is absolutely amazing! Jaw dropping. 35 years ago I first saw a picture of the Borobudur and I immediately knew: one fine day I will see this temple, I will stand on this beautiful temple! And now this long cherished dream come's true. A bit risky, because the bigger the dream, the more chance of disappointment. However in this case it was absolutely not disappointing. No, in contrary this world wonder will fulfill every  expectation. Perhaps sometimes it is too busy, but take your time and enjoy your visit. I certainly did.

Certainly a must see when visiting jogja. The temple itself and the surrounding views are phenomenal. Easily accessible. Make sure to climb to the top to enjoy the best 360 pano views. The park is unfortunately quite commercialized but thankfully this is kept far enough away from the temple itself. Would certainly visit again.
One of the finest and oldest Buddhist Temples in Indonesia, stunning design and beautiful scenery from the top. A must visit if in Yogyakarta.
Beautiful temple,would highly recommend getting a guide and learning the stories about this place, made the experience so much more valuable!

The temple was good, but everything around is disgusting. First you arrive and follow the sign "pintu masuk" only to realize that you've been tricked to go through the market with overpriced souvenirs, the entrance nowhere near here. Then to exit the temple you have to find your way out through another market. It's like a maze, not meant for tall people. Eventually you will end up where you started (where the entrance should be).
Always amazed and awed with this wonderful temple. Proud to have this site.

Simply stunning to visit, even better with a sunrise. Entry is IDR500k for sunrise for foreigners. Domestic only pay IDR370k. They also have student prices. Price includes breakfast or dinner if going at sunset, and the breakfast buffet was as good as any 4 star hotel buffet. The temple is a must see, go early as it gets busy quick.

Very unusual temple. Not like any we had seen in SE Asia. Nice detail with the buddhas inside the bells. The mist in the morning was stunning and the surrounding area very green, luscious and well kept.

The entry fee is high as they go in this part of the world ($25). If you go on the sunset tour there's a free scarf which I dont care much for- I'd rather have had a lower entrance fee and have saved the planet by reducing the production of unneccesary clothing.
It was such a beautiful temple I had to give it a 5 star. People were so nice and welcomes you warmly, even though we went there for sunrise, very early in the morning. The view was magnificent.
Must go when you are in area. The legendary temple offers you nice view on top

Nice place but not for those who have problems with legs. Also not for old people, they won't be able to climb the stairs under high temperature.
Well preserved stone temple. I suggest clear explanation of how to explore the temple delivered clearly to each visitor.
Paid 15k rupiah per person for a short trip with long electric golf car but still they drop us at gate to mercandise shops labelled with exit gate, and its like forever just to get out of there, like had to walk 300 to 400 to free me from that corridor! Hate that so much.

Amazing temple. That is a great one. If you visit this temple, you have to go to every single sides here. You have to go on top to find the beautiful view. You just need to get ready with a great stamina.
Borobudur temple is a tourist destination that must be visited, besides we can enjoy the view of the amazing temple we can also while learning history.

Very nice and beautiful place to visit in yogyakarta. But it's quite hot! My friends and I visited Borobudur temple around 8-9 but it was so hot. Better to bring sunglasses and hat if you have. If you dont have you can buy before you enter this place.

A well known Buddhist Temple and also a world heritage. The weather usually is very hot and humid in there so you better wear a comfortable outfit. Get ready to climb on lots of stairs there to get a perfect view from the top.

This is an amazing place. The historical value of this building is so amazing. With its large and grand stature this is truly a sight to behold for any history lover or just any tourist coming for a visit
Very expensive! Many selfie-taking youngsters - it is difficult to enjoy or to take photos. There are much better temples in Cambodia or Myanmar.

World heritage site. Very interesting! It charges a higher cost for foreigb tourist, 7 times the local tickets at the time I visited. (25$ a ticket on a weekend)
But it is worth it, you get to set your feet in the very temple and get to witness the greatness with your own eyes. As you climb the temple you get to see the beautiful view of mountains and greeneries, I find it enjoyable and serene. I suggest taking one level at a time and go around it before getting on the next level. Murals/carving on the walls of the temple tells different stories on each side and level, might be useful to read up abt it first before visiting so you don't need a local guide(more fee). The exit is confusing as you're led towards a maze of trinkets and souvenir shop that feels like it never ends. 
They don't let you enter with shorts, they will provide some fabric to cover up (no extra fee). Rules to abide: DON'T step or sit on the stones that are not for walking, this is a part of precious history, they are fragile. DON'T carve into the stones. DO pay attention on which stairways are used to descend and which ones are for ascending.
Worth the visit for sure!

Been to this temple only once but i can never forget the beauty of this place. I cant imagine how the temple was created with only a handful of crude tools. One of Indonesia's best temples. A must visit for those visiting Central Java, Indonesia

Definitely something to see once in your life, but be prepared for the following:
The entrance price is insanely high, you have to deal with litterally a swarm of street vendorss trying to sell you all sort of things.
The exit forces you through an endless maze of shops, again not selling anything worth attention.
Lack of general information about the temple, its functions and origins.
Tour guides following you around trying to sell them their services.
If you're keen of history then make sure you visit here because there's a big history behind this temple.
Haven't been returning here since years ago. Now the surrounding is very green, with beautiful parks. Catch shuttle transports from/to entrance rather than walking if taking kids with you.
Beautiful architecture and history of the place. Be prepared to walk and bring along umbrella, water, and portable fans.

You can only say WOW
If you have time.try to make a time once in your life to visit this site.you will be amazed.try to explore every single floor.it's worth the time spend.this Borobudur temple opens from 6am - 5pm.it costs idr 50.000. you can asked for a guide for adding idr 150.000 in entrance fee.the guide will help you to explain the story behind all the temple.make sure you are in a good shape.good feet.the walks, the climb are quite exhausting.if you bring elderly make sure you bring wheelchair.brings your hat,sunglasses,umbrella to shade.in the exit you may find some stalls bring cash. Come here for the sunrise or sunsets.. it is magical..

It was massive and good to see but dont come in extreme heat because its miserable. Also being a tourist all the locals wanted selfies with us which was driving me nuts. That really needs to stop because I couldnt enjoy myself.

We went for the sunrise tour. Make sure to leave Jogyarkata around 3:30am if you want to arrive there in time. We were surprised to get complimentary buffet breakfast with our tickets. You also get flashlights for the climb up onto the temple in the dark, the sun started rising about 5am. Really amazing view of the mountains and the misty valley

There are three stage in Borobudur temple, every single stage have differents story.

The first stage tell relief about bad human. The second stage tell about life of human in the earth. And the last stage tell about Budha and Heaven.

I suggest you after visit Borobudur you also visit chicken church near of temple, the biggest shape like a dove.

Love the Temple.. What can I said about one of the World Heritage. But.... To go out from the place, was frustrating. We have to go through a maze of souvenirs sellers. There's no other way.. And It was so far..  We supposed to have a choice, go to sellers place or straight to the parking space. So frustrated..

There is no reason you don't like this place if you are a fan of historical building and love to understand about culture. This one of the oldest temple in the world and full of different statue of Buddha. You can feel the calm and peace inside but of course if can get really crowded if you are visiting during peak tourist season. The entrance fee for foreigners is around 25USD. Personally feel it is worth the price.
UNESCO WORLD HERITAGE site ..very beautiful in deed ..neat and clean place well maintained by the Indonesians

Borobudur temple is a beautiful tourism object. Full of history and of course I can learn about the culture. Visiting Borobudur temple with my students make me happy because I can introduce about the story and history to my students. It's still my favorite place. I can enjoy sunset there.

Great heritage site in Central Java. The temple is located in the middle of very large park, a little bit far away from the parking lot, but you can rent golf car or andong to reach the temple entrance. The best time to visit this place is early morning or in the afternoon, because it is very hot in the noon time.

A nice temple and an actual must see, but at a high price with a broken system: too many large (school) groups that believe western tourists are the main attraction, while we pay a ticket fee way too high for Indonesian standards and compared to other temples (e.g. Angkor Wat; much more value for money). Furthermore, the tourist trap ("market") at the end is extremely lengthy with no shortcut.
a very nice place, a historical legacy that is included in the 7 wonders of the world.  great for making short videos or photos.  highly recommend this place to visit... Come on

The biggest Buddhist temple in the world with intricate reliefs and beautiful surrounding. It should be on everybodys bucket list. A lot of walking will be involved, but its worth it. Dont forget to take pictures before you climb up the temple, and after reaching the top of the temple.

Went for the Sunrise tour starting at 4:30am. Reasonably expensive (500K Rp with gift and breakfast at hotel included) but so much worth It! Got lucky with the sunrise during the rainy season and catch a nice red sun! The place is outstanding! The history is extremely interesting, highly recommend a guide! (250K Rp).  You got to be one of the few people to the see the sun rising at a UNESCO monument, it is unique!

Not worth the price. 25 dollars, in Indonesia? Its more than most touristic places in Europe.
Also, they make you go to an exit which is opposite from where you entered, so you have to walk a lot (they try to sell you seats on small trains) and get lost in a labyrinth of shops to find the exit. It seems to be in an airport or in Ikea, more than a sacred temple.

Borobudur Temple is the biggest Buddhist temple in South East Asia. This ancient temple was built in 9th century and one of the world's seven wonders. It's so beautiful temple. The view from the top also amazing. The only bad thing from this complex is the exit that forces visitors to go trough the market that took almost half hour because they create it without way out except follow the route. After tired walking around the temple and then we have to walk to walk to parking lot for that far, it was unpleasant at all
Very nice, but very hot air while you're visit in the middle of day. Very crowded while holiday. It's recommended bring a hat or umbrella while visiting here.

This temple is located in Magelang Java. You can enter this temple by paying Rp 50,000 as the entrance fee.
The Temple is a place for Buddhism to pray and worship their god. So, we need to mind our manner.
I suggest to this Temple around 4 PM because it is not too hot to explore the Temple and take a lot of picture. 
May you enjoy your trip in this one of world Heritage.

Obviously the temple is amazing, but you won't have time to enjoy it with all the people wanting to take your photo. Completely lovely and harmless, but literally it took us an hour to walk down the road to get to the temple and while on it, couldn't walk 2 minutes without being stopped. About 200 times over the course of 2 hours, no lie. It's a busy place and sees about 300,000 tourists a day, so be prepared for that. Also, the walk to exit goes on forever as do the people trying to sell you stuff. Just be prepared and wear a smile, and suncream.
Amazing atmosphere and architecture. Sunset at this location is amazing however it gets packed with a lot of tourists.

Went to and arrived at Borobudur at 4.30am to see sunrise at 5.45am.
Was spectacular despite the heavy fog im d horizon. As the sun rose, Mt. Merapi erupted and sent cloud of ashes sky high. Certainly once in a lifetime experience.

Borobudur itself is a sight to see and marvel. I hope that all of us can always treasure it.
Great place. If you love history, photography and Buddhism, that's the place to go. Prepare yourself to take some pictures with the lovely Indonesian kids around the temple :-)

Truly amazing structure no idea how they made things this incredible that long ago.

If your white be prepared to have your photo with lots of people and school kids want to practise their english on you.   All very friendly though no hassle from anyone and just an amazing site to behold.

Borobodur even though its quite expensive to enter its definitely worth it. Its so unique that you just cannot miss it. The energy is amazing. Its big so you dont feel youre surrounded by big crowds, so each can find its peaceful corner there and enjoy. The morning glow over the temple is what every tourist wants to see, morning sunrise tours are organized every day here. 
Its at about one hour from the city center of Yogyakarta. Its an easy ride on scooter.

It is the world's largest Buddhist temple.Â The temple consists of nine stacked platforms, six square and three circular, topped by a central dome. It is decorated with 2,672Â relief panels and 504Â Buddha statues. The central dome is surrounded by 72 Buddha statues, each seated inside a perforatedÂ stupa.

A historical place at Jogjakarta Indonesia. Outside the temple, there are various stall that offer you food, souvenirs, cloths and many more with an affordable price. The view was also awesome. U may ride a bike (rent) or ride a horse (rent) around the place. However, climbing the wall are strictly prohibited.
It wad great to visit it. The temple is amazing. Need extra energy to walk up the stairs, but when u reach the peak.. your eyes will be spoiled by an amzing view.

The Borobudur is wonderful, but even in low season so many tourist. And the entrance price for sunrise is ridiculous. Watch sunrise at Punthuk setumbu and visit Borobudur later to safe some money and have a way better experience. And take your time to see everything.

Borobudur Temple, the largest temple in Indonesia.  Hats, umbrellas, and drinking water will be very helpful during hot weather.  Everything was good, except for the exit of the temple, which circled like a maze.  Visitors are forced to pass all traders in that location.  A direct path should be provided for visitors who want to get out of the temple immediately (due to illness, persons with disabilities, or do not want to enter the market location).

the fantastic tample made by human ever. if you're a artchitec or Civil engineering don't miss this building. Borobudur have amazing structures, we can learning about something we don't know.
amazing

The best temple ever with Ive seen. But for better experience you need to meet sunrise or sunset. The best think if you meet the sunrise. Exactly ypu need to be able to wake up at 3 am and go to the top of temple and wait for sunrise. However when you see it, you will never forget it

Stunning view and history! But hate the exit route after u enter the Borobudur! Absolutely loathe it. Very long and narrow exit route. Very impractical, dizzying and dangerous (if something -- like earthquake -- happens). too many street market.

Borobudur is the largest Buddhist temple in the world. Very beautiful architecture and good scenery. This is one of the best place for hunting the sunset (look at the stunning photos i had taken). Surrounded with paddy fields and forest, Borobudur was named in 7 wonders in the world. You have to come here!

I always excited to come here because I admire this place so much. The historical value, the story, the relief, the sculpture, were amazed me. Prepare the stamina for walking from the entrance to the temple and walking from the temple to the exit, because they placed far far away.
The biggest evidence of Buddhism (Mahayana) on Java island. This place is so crowded in early morning due to the sunrise trip. However, this is the best of sunrise observing in my opinion. :)

A huge temple! i mean, like, real HUGE!! With more than 500 Buddha statues and sculpture on the wall. When the first time i went to Borobudur Temple 10 years ago, there was not so many trees at all, only a dry field or savana. And it was really hot. But now there's a lot of trees, and carts to take the tourist to the temple. Also there's now a lot of people who rent umbrellas. When we get there, there's a lot of people selling water and souvenirs too on the parking lot. And they won't let any food or drink in the temple area. Yes there is a nice restaurant after the exit, but you expect to spend a lot of time in the temple (and in a hot weather) so it's better if you eat before you get here.
But the temple is worth it. It's beautiful temple and beautiful view.

Borobudur is one of the most amazing ancient structures that I have ever seen. I strongly recommend that you read up on the history and rediscovery of the incredible temple.  When you walk the rings and view the intricate details and know the meaning behind it just make the experience  magical. The top 3 levels are the 72 bell housing with a spectacular 360 view of the supervacanos surrounding this temple in the distance.  This is a absolute must on your bucket list..

Ancient Buddhist temple in central java.
Please use modest clothing (sleeve and long pants/skirt, sarong) to show respect :)
Enjoy the beautiful sunrise on a non cloudy day and breath the fresh air

The temple is impressive and beautiful. I was shocked though to see that they offer ELEPHANT RIDING at a Buddhist temple! Dont ride these Elephants! This couldnt more disagree with the teachings of Buddah and is unacceptable. Theyre kept in this tiny place its terrible!

Lovely place. But please leave those chained elephants free. It's cruel and insane. One of the saddest things I've ever seen. Buddhism principles are not close to those businesses for unconscious people. 
Mindfulness please

Indonesians grew up learning that Borobudur is one of the 7 wonders of the world, well the reality is otherwise. 
But it's still indeed a majestic beautiful temple.  Enjoyed getting lost around the lower levels looking at the engravings at the wall. 
Most would just rush to the top and take selfies but there are so many beautiful images in the lower level. 

Caution the steps are quite steep and sometimes uneven

It was a meditative and peaceful walk around the 10 levels, beginning from the lower levels of desire to the middle levels of the control of desire and ultimately to the upper levels of nirvana, transcendence of desire. The circular meditative walk allows one to contemplate the purpose and struggles of one's life and perhaps the power, the tormenting moments, and necessity of desire in life. On the way to the exit, one will have to pass through the maze-like market place, meandering through the souvenir shops and food stalls. In the end, the tour ends where it begins -- desire or to be precise the cultivation of desire. Perhaps, desire is as much cultural and cultivated, as it is existential and biological.

I just love historical sites. Love the stories behind it. I wish time travelling is a real thing. But honestly, since they really took a good care of this temple, it actually got better since the last time i was there years ago. But the public toilet in the museum is kind of dirty and need some attention.

This place is HOT without air movement.
They make you walk about 10,000 steps to get from start to back to car.
So many people that it is basically a mob at any given time.
Now, for the good: it is breath takingly beautiful. And serene. And old.  And maintained well.  Was it worth the 2hour drive time? Only if you go at 3am to get there at sunrise would this be worth the trek.  
Photos Jan 2020.
Lovely calm surroundings.  Beautiful buildings.  Able to walk in and out of most buildings to self tour. Definitely a must to see.

I traveled  there with my family last December 2019. Borobudur never fails to amaze me with its grandeur. However, you have to prepare your stamina well enough since you'll need all the energy to walk up and down the temple, and to circle an alley of market full of merchandise sellers in your way out - such an inefficient way to exit especially when you are an elderly. I highly recommend that the authorities/management also pay more attention to tourists' convenience.

Still capable to amaze me even if it's my 3rd visit if I'm not wrong. More comfortable with a lot of choice for shuttle so u can choose yours. The price for souvenirs also make sense if u good in bargain. Very proud to be Indonesian.

Wonderful and fantastic temple ever made by human civilization, must visited place especially when you visit Yogyakarta.... Suggestion for this precious world heritage, Indonesian government must protect and make this place special resort area. Street trader also must be regulated, so every tourist can enjoy they trip here...

This place brought me peace and energy while been there waiting for the sunrise. From darkness to light you will have the opportunity to see the magnificent of that majestic temple. I highly recommend going before sunrise and take your time contemplating the site. Take your time also for take some pictures but most important don't forget to feel where you are!

Joined a sunrise tour (5am) to visit Borobudur temple - however I think a sunrise tour is not necessary as it was cloudy during December and best to view it during dry season. You have to be up early for sunrise tour but if youre not a fan of waking up early, suggest to go for the Good Morning Borobudur tour that starts at 7am. Its quaint in the early morning, many local students will be in by 8am to practice their English with tourists so be prepared to get asked for pictures together or converse with them! Would suggest to read up on the history and culture of the temple on your own as cultural tours in the temple are rather expensive.

Borobudur is one of the most amazing ancient structures that I have ever seen. I strongly recommend that you read up on the history and rediscovery of the incredible temple. The temple consists of nine stacked platforms, six square and three circular, topped by a central dome. It is decorated with 2,672 relief panels and 504 Buddha statues. The central dome is surrounded by 72 Buddha statues, each seated inside a perforated stupa.

No wonder it is claimed as one of the 7 wonders. Borobudur temple is really really magnificent and magical. Seeing the reliefs  and architectures...I wonder how the architect did that on the 8th century. Gunadarma is the real genius ????
The sunrise view from the top of this temple is breathtaking! ??????
I don't know how to describe it. It's so beautiful ??????

This temple is very interesting and we had a beautiful sunrise amongst the fog that gives mystery to the surroundings... highly recommended ! The package offered by the hotel was good value at the end... amazing breakfast and 2 little gift??
Awesome! The biggest Buddhist Temple in the world ??

One of my fav recreation place because it has special lane for stroller and wheelchair. Attractions that we can enjoy is not only the 'candi' but also spacious garden,elephant cage,etc. Dont forget to bring sunglasses, hat, and drinking water ??.
The beauty of ???? heritage ??????????
Good place for my kid plus breathtaking view from above ??
Wonderful ?? place... Kindness people along to go there
I love this place. Verry beautiful, verry simple to find this temple, i cant describe again but im verry love this place ???

"Borobudur is a Buddhist temple located in Borobudur, Magelang, Central Java, Indonesia. This temple is located approximately 100 km to the southwest of Semarang, 86 km to the west of Surakarta, and 40 km to the northwest of Yogyakarta. This stupa-shaped temple was founded by Mahayana Buddhists around the year 800 AD during the reign of the Syailendra dynasty. Borobudur is the largest Buddhist temple or temple in the world, as well as one of the largest Buddhist monuments in the world.

This monument consists of six square-shaped terraces on which there are three circular courtyards, the walls are decorated with 2,672 relief panels and originally there are 504 Buddha statues. Borobudur has the most complete and most extensive collection of Buddhist reliefs in the world [3]. The largest main stupa lies in the center and crowns this building, surrounded by three circular lines of 72 hollow stupas in which there is a Buddha statue sitting cross-legged in a perfect lotus position with a mudra (hand attitude) Dharmachakra mudra (turning the wheel of dharma).

This monument is a model of the universe and was built as a sacred place to glorify the Buddha as well as function as a place of pilgrimage to guide humanity to move from the world of lust to enlightenment and wisdom according to Buddhist teachings. Pilgrims enter through the east side and begin the ritual at the base of the temple by walking around the sacred building in a clockwise direction, while continuing to ascend to the next steps through three levels of realm in Buddhist cosmology. These three levels are K?madh?tu (the realm of lust), Rupadhatu (the realm of the form), and Arupadhatu (the realm of the intangible). On the way the pilgrims walked through a series of aisles and stairs by watching no less than 1,460 beautiful relief panels carved into the walls and balustrades.

According to historical evidence, Borobudur was abandoned in the 14th century as the weakening influence of the Hindu and Buddhist kingdoms on Java and the entry of Islamic influence began. The world began to realize the existence of this building since it was discovered in 1814 by Sir Thomas Stamford Raffles, who at that time served as Governor General of England over Java. Since then Borobudur has experienced a series of rescue and restoration efforts (repairs). The largest restoration project was held in the period 1975 to 1982 under the efforts of the Government of the Republic of Indonesia and UNESCO, then this historic site was included in the list of World Heritage Sites.

Borobudur is still used as a place of religious pilgrimage; every year Buddhists who come from all over Indonesia and abroad gather in Borobudur to commemorate Vesak Trisuci. In the world of tourism, Borobudur is the single tourist attraction in Indonesia that is most visited by tourists."

Borobudur, or Barabudur (Indonesian: Candi Borobudur, Javanese: ????????????, romanized: Candhi Barabudhur) is a 9th-century Mahayana Buddhist temple in Magelang Regency, not far from the town of Muntilan, in Central Java, Indonesia. It is the world's largest Buddhist temple.The temple consists of nine stacked platforms, six square and three circular, topped by a central dome. It is decorated with 2,672 relief panels and 504 Buddha statues. The central dome is surrounded by 72 Buddha statues, each seated inside a perforated stupa.

Built in the 9th century during the reign of the Sailendra Dynasty, the temple design follows Javanese Buddhist architecture, which blends the Indonesian indigenous cult of ancestor worship and the Buddhist concept of attaining Nirvana. The temple demonstrates the influences of Gupta art that reflects India's influence on the region, yet there are enough indigenous scenes and elements incorporated to make Borobudur uniquely Indonesian. The monument is a shrine to the Lord Buddha and a place for Buddhist pilgrimage. The pilgrim journey begins at the base of the monument and follows a path around the monument, ascending to the top through three levels symbolic of Buddhist cosmology: K?madh?tu (the world of desire), R?padh?tu (the world of forms) and Ar?padh?tu (the world of formlessness). The monument guides pilgrims through an extensive system of stairways and corridors with 1,460 narrative relief panels on the walls and the balustrades. Borobudur has one of the largest and most complete ensembles of Buddhist reliefs in the world.

Evidence suggests that Borobudur was constructed in the 9th century and subsequently abandoned following the 14th-century decline of Hindu kingdoms in Java and the Javanese conversion to Islam. Worldwide knowledge of its existence was sparked in 1814 by Sir Thomas Stamford Raffles, then the British ruler of Java, who was advised of its location by native Indonesians. Borobudur has since been preserved through several restorations. The largest restoration project was undertaken between 1975 and 1982 by the Indonesian government and UNESCO, followed by the monument's listing as a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

Candi Prambanan atau Candi Roro Jonggrang(Hanacaraka: ?????????????? , Candhi Prambanan) adalah kompleks candi Hinduterbesar di Indonesia yang dibangun pada abad ke-9 masehi. Candi ini dipersembahkan untuk Trimurti, tiga dewa utama Hindu yaitu Brahma sebagai dewa pencipta, Wishnusebagai dewa pemelihara, dan Siwa sebagai dewa pemusnah. Berdasarkan prasasti Siwagrha nama asli kompleks candi ini adalah Siwagrha (bahasa Sanskerta yang bermakna 'Rumah Siwa'), dan memang di garbagriha(ruang utama) candi ini bersemayam arca Siwa Mahadewa setinggi tiga meter yang menujukkan bahwa di candi ini dewa Siwa lebih diutamakan.

Candi ini adalah termasuk Situs Warisan Dunia UNESCO, candi Hindu terbesar di Indonesia, sekaligus salah satu candi terindah di Asia Tenggara. Arsitektur bangunan ini berbentuk tinggi dan ramping sesuai dengan arsitektur Hindu pada umumnya dengan candi Siwa sebagai candi utama memiliki ketinggian mencapai 47 meter menjulang di tengah kompleks gugusan candi-candi yang lebih kecil.Sebagai salah satu candi termegah di Asia Tenggara, candi Prambanan menjadi daya tarik kunjungan wisatawan dari seluruh dunia.
Menurut prasasti Siwagrha, candi ini mulai dibangun pada sekitar tahun 850 masehi oleh Rakai Pikatan, dan terus dikembangkan dan diperluas oleh Balitung Maha Sambu, pada masa kerajaan Medang Mataram.

Sejarah Asli Candi Prambanan  Salah satu candi yang terkenal di tanah air kita tercinta adalah Candi Prambanan. Candi yang merupakan candi bagi umat Hindu ini memiliki gaya arsitektural yang berbeda dengan Candi Borobudur. Namun tentu saja, Wisata Candi Prambanan tidak kalah keindahannya dibanding Candi Borobudur maupun candi Angkor Wat.
Candi Prambanan terletak di desa Bokoharjo, Kecamatan Prambanan, Kabupaten Sleman Jogjakarta. Berbeda dengan sejarah asli Candi Prambanan, nama dari candi ini sudah melegenda lewat kisah cinta tak sampai antara Bandung Bandawasa dan Rara Jongrang.
Konon menurut legenda, Rara Jonggrang meminta seribu candi dalam satu malam sebagai syarat lamaran Bandung Bandawasa. Melalu bantuan mahluk jin, Bandung Bandawasa mampu menyelesaikan seribu candi yang pada akhirnya digagalkan sendiri oleh Rara Jonggrang

Candi Prambanan merupakan candi Hindu yang terbesar di Indonesia. Sampai saat ini belum dapat dipastikan kapan candi ini dibangun dan atas perintah siapa, namun kuat dugaan bahwa Candi Prambanan dibangun sekitar pertengahan abad ke-9 oleh raja dari Wangsa Sanjaya, yaitu Raja Balitung Maha Sambu. Dugaan tersebut didasarkan pada isi Prasasti Syiwagrha yang ditemukan di sekitar Prambanan dan saat ini tersimpan di Museum Nasional di Jakarta. Prasasti berangka tahun 778 Saka (856 M) ini ditulis pada masa pemerintahan Rakai Pikatan.

Denah asli Candi Prambanan berbentuk persegi panjang, terdiri atas halaman luar dan tiga pelataran, yaitu Jaba (pelataran luar), Tengahan (pelataran tengah) dan Njeron (pelataran dalam). Halaman luar merupakan areal terbuka yang mengelilingi pelataran luar. Pelataran luar berbentuk bujur dengan luas 390 m2. Pelataran ini dahulu dikelilingi oleh pagar batu yang kini sudah tinggal reruntuhan. Pelataran luar saat ini hanya merupakan pelataran kosong. Belum diketahui apakah semula terdapat bangunan atau hiasan lain di pelataran ini.

Di tengah pelataran luar, terdapat pelataran kedua, yaitu pelataran tengah yang berbentuk persegi panjang seluas 222 m2. Pelataran tengah dahulu juga dikelilingi pagar batu yang saat ini juga sudah runtuh. Pelataran ini terdiri atas empat teras berundak, makin ke dalam makin tinggi. Di teras pertama, yaitu teras yang terbawah, terdapat 68 candi kecil yang berderet berkeliling, terbagi dalam empat baris oleh jalan penghubung antarpintu pelataran. Di teras kedua terdapat 60 candi, di teras ketiga terdapat 52 candi, dan di teras keempat, atau teras teratas, terdapat 44 candi. Seluruh candi di pelataran tengah ini mempunyai bentuk dan ukuran yang sama, yaitu luas denah dasar 6 m2 dan tinggi 14 m. Hampir semua candi di pelataran tengah tersebut saat ini dalam keadaan hancur. Yang tersisa hanya reruntuhannya saja.

Pelataran dalam, merupakan pelataran yang paling tinggi letaknya dan yang dianggap sebagai tempat yang paling suci. Pelataran ini berdenah persegi empat seluas 110 m2, dengan tinggi sekitar 1,5 m dari permukaan teras teratas pelataran tengah. Pelataran ini dikelilingi oleh turap dan pagar batu. Di keempat sisinya terdapat gerbang berbentuk gapura paduraksa. Saat ini hanya gapura di sisi selatan yang masih utuh. Di depan masing-masing gerbang pelataran teratas terdapat sepasang candi kecil, berdenah dasar bujur sangkar seluas 1, 5 m2 dengan tinggi 4 m.

Di pelataran dalam terdapat 2 barisan candi yang membujur arah utara selatan. Di barisan barat terdapat 3 buah candi yang menghadap ke timur. Candi yang letaknya paling utara adalah Candi Wisnu, di tengah adalah Candi Syiwa, dan di selatan adalah Candi Brahma. Di barisan timur juga terdapat 3 buah candi yang menghadap ke barat. Ketiga candi ini disebut candi wahana (wahana = kendaraan), karena masing-masing candi diberi nama sesuai dengan binatang yang merupakan tunggangan dewa yang candinya terletak di hadapannya.

Candi yang berhadapan dengan Candi Wisnu adalah Candi Garuda, yang berhadapan dengan Candi Syiwa adalah Candi Nandi (lembu), dan yang berhadapan dengan Candi Brahma adalah Candi Angsa. Dengan demikian, keenam candi ini saling berhadapan membentuk lorong. Candi Wisnu, Brahma, Angsa, Garuda dan Nandi mempunyai bentuk dan ukuran yang sama, yaitu berdenah dasar bujur sangkar seluas 15 m2 dengan tinggi 25 m. Di ujung utara dan selatan lorong masing-masing terdapat sebuah candi kecil yang saling berhadapan, yang disebut Candi Apit.

Sampai saat ini belum dapat dipastikan kapan candi ini dibangun dan atas perintah siapa, namun kuat dugaan bahwa Candi Prambanan dibangun sekitar pertengahan abad ke-9 oleh raja dari Wangsa Sanjaya, yaitu Raja Balitung Maha Sambu. Dugaan tersebut didasarkan pada isi Prasasti Syiwagrha yang ditemukan di sekitar Prambanan dan saat ini tersimpan di Museum Nasional di Jakarta. Prasasti berangka tahun 778 Saka (856 M) ini ditulis pada masa pemerintahan Rakai Pikatan.

Kompleks candi ini terletak di kecamatan Prambanan, Sleman, DI Yogyakarta dan kecamatan Prambanan, Klaten, Jawa Tengah kurang lebih 17 kilometer timur laut Yogyakarta, 50 kilometer barat daya Surakarta dan 120 kilometer selatan Semarang, persis di perbatasan antara provinsi Jawa Tengah dan Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta. Letaknya sangat unik, Candi Prambanan terletak di wilayah administrasi desa Bokoharjo, Prambanan, Sleman, sedangkan pintu masuk kompleks Candi Prambanan terletak di wilayah adminstrasi desa Tlogo, Prambanan, Klaten.

Candi ini adalah termasuk Situs Warisan DuniaUNESCO, candi Hindu terbesar di Indonesia, sekaligus salah satu candi terindah di Asia Tenggara. Arsitektur bangunan ini berbentuk tinggi dan ramping sesuai dengan arsitektur Hindu pada umumnya dengan candi Siwa sebagai candi utama memiliki ketinggian mencapai 47 meter menjulang di tengah kompleks gugusan candi-candi yang lebih kecil. Sebagai salah satu candi termegah di Asia Tenggara, candi Prambanan menjadi daya tarik kunjungan wisatawan dari seluruh dunia.

Menurut prasasti Siwagrha, candi ini mulai dibangun pada sekitar tahun 850 masehi oleh Rakai Pikatan, dan terus dikembangkan dan diperluas oleh Balitung Maha Sambu, pada masa kerajaan Medang Mataram.

Lokasinya dekat jalur jalan raya antar provinsi dan pasar prambanan. Kalo ditempuh naik bis tinggal bilang turun prambanan, mka akan langsung ada di depan pintu masuk wisata. Harga tiket masuknya kisaran 40.000, bisa sewa payung juga harganya kisaran 10 rb. Lokasinya luas banget. Dan disini terdapat beberapa kompleks candi, seperti candi prambanan itu sendiri dg candi brahma di dalamnya terdapat arca dewa brahma, candi wisnu di dalamnya terdapat arca dewa wisnu, dan candi siwa, didalamnya terdapat arca dewa siwa, ganesha dan dewi durga dipewujudkan sebagai sosok roro jonggrang dalam legenda prambanan itu sendiri. Disekitarnya juga terdapat candi2 kecil dan beberapa candi yg belum jadi. Ada juga kompleks candi sewu. O ya saran kalo kesini jangan hanya berfoto2 ??. Banyak banget turis luar negeri yg kesini dan mempelajari tiap relief dan arca yg ada lewat guidenya. Dan mereka mungkin yg lebih tau makna reliefnya daripada kita, so alangkah lebih baik kalo kita juga mempelajarinya secara langsung, kalo diperhatikan dg seksama tiap dinding candi semua punya relief yg berbeda jika itu terlihat seperti burung yg sma sebenarnya burung itu berada dalam posisi yg berbeda tentunya setiap relief punya maknanya masing2 kan. So dari situ kita bisa menarik kesimpulan bahwa kita memiliki peninggalan sejarah yg begitu berharga dan besar dari negara yg lain. Sehingga sudah patutnya kita juga turut menjaganya. Tata ruang kompleks wisata juga tertata dg baik serta terjaga bersih. Sebelum keluar dari kompleks wisata candi pun kita harus melalui pasar oleh2 khas prambanan mulai dari souvenir, fashion dan makanan semua ada disini. Souvenir seperti gantungan kunci, dan gelang pun juga murah, harganya mulai dari Rp. 1000

Candi Prambanan adalah candi yang terletak di klaten berbatasan dengan jogja kearah solo, terletak di pinggir jalan raya, tempat yang indah dan selalu ramai dikunjungi terutama di hari libur, merupakan candi hindu yang megah dan sering diadakan pertunjukan tarian kebudayaan, tiket cukup terjangkau dan edukatif untuk anak2, recommended

Salah satu candi Hindu terbesar di Indonesia. Lokasi di jalan raya Jogja-Solo. Sangat oanas jika siang hari. Tapi banyak sekali ilmu2 yg didapat tentang sejarah agama Hindu pada zaman dahulu. Disini juga menyediakan berbagai macam tour package

Candi Prambanan merupakan salah satu tempat wisata yang wajib dikunjungi apabila anda berada di sekitar Klaten. Candi ini merupakan salah satu warisan budaya yang telah ditetapkan UNESCO. Arsitekturnya sangat rapi dan indah. Lingkungan Candi Prambanan asri dan juga bersih. Tak ada sampah berserakan di sana dan banyak pepohonan di samping jalan. Candi Prambanan adalah tempat wisata yang sangat cocok bagi anda yang ingin bersepeda, jalan - jalan, ataupun menaiki mobil keliling. Tak hanya candi, di dalam kompleks ini juga terdapat beberapa cafe yang bisa memanjakan perut anda ketika lapar. Candi Prambanan memiliki jumlah wisatawan global yang tidak sedikit. Walaupun hanya candi, namun panorama yang diberikan dapat memukau semua pengunjung. Saya harap, setiap wisatawan yang datang ke tempat ini dapat tetap menjaga kebersihan kompleks candi dan menjaga keasriannya.

Candi Prambanan atau sering di sebut juga Candi Lorojongrang merupakan komplek peninggalan Agama Hindu terbesar di Indonesia,juga terindah di Asia tenggara.Bangunan ini di perkirakan di bangun pada abad ke 9 untuk persembahan kepada dewa Brahma,Wisnu dan Syiwa ( TRIMURTI).Di sini juga ada rilief yang menceritakan cerita RAMAYANA dalam kisah Rama dan Shinta.

Lokasi Candi berada di 2 wilayah Sleman (DIY),dan Klaten (JATENG),uniknya nama kecamatannya sama yaitu Prambanan.Untuk masuknya tiketnya seharga 40.000 rb.Buka mulai jam 6 pagi sampai 5 sore.

Bagi wisatawan yang ingin ke Prambanan waktu yang tepat pagi sekalian atau sore hari,karena di dalam candi panas sekali.Kalau datang siang sebaiknya bawa payung,topi,bekal minuman.Banyak spot menarik buat di abadikan lewat kamera.Dan jangan sekali-sekali usil merusak/corat coret sembarangan karena Candi Prambanan merupakan warisan budaya dunia yang di tetapakan "UNESCO".

Di pintu keluar wisatawan bisa beli berbagai barang suvenir atau kuliner khas jogja.Tinggal pilih  harganya juga standar hampir sama di Malioboro asal pandai menawar.Ruang parkirnya cukup luas buat menampung ratusan kendaraan bahkan bis wisata.Banyak pohon di area parkiran bisa istirahat sambil ngadem.

Untuk menuju Candi Prambanan dari arah Jogja  selain kendaraan pribadi bisa naik tanspotasi umum seperti online atau TRANSJOGJA jalur 1 A.Terminalnya ada di sebelah selatan candi dekat Pasar Prambanan ongkosnya murah cuma 3500.Atau naik bis jurusan Jogja -Solo turun di terminal.Tapi kita harus rela berjalan kaki sekitar 200 meter untuk sampai pintu masuk candi.

Di Candi Prambanan sering di adakan acara level Nasional maupun Internasional seperti pergelaran musik,Marathon,Festival.Dan sebagai warga Indonesia harus bangga banyak warisan Budaya yang di akui internasional bahkan dijadikan cargar budaya oleh UNESCO.

Candi Prambanan  Salah satu candi yang terkenal di tanah air kita tercinta adalah Candi Prambanan. Candi yang merupakan candi bagi umat Hindu ini memiliki gaya arsitektural yang berbeda dengan Candi Borobudur. Namun tentu saja, Wisata Candi Prambanan tidak kalah keindahannya dibanding Candi Borobudur maupun candi Angkor Wat.

Candi Prambanan terletak di desa Bokoharjo, Kecamatan Prambanan, Kabupaten Sleman Jogjakarta. Berbeda dengan sejarah asli Candi Prambanan, nama dari candi ini sudah melegenda lewat kisah cinta tak sampai antara Bandung Bandawasa dan Rara Jongrang.

Konon menurut legenda, Rara Jonggrang meminta seribu candi dalam satu malam sebagai syarat lamaran Bandung Bandawasa. Melalu bantuan mahluk jin, Bandung Bandawasa mampu menyelesaikan seribu candi yang pada akhirnya digagalkan sendiri oleh Rara Jonggrang.
 
Mengetahui kecurangan yang dilakukan oleh Rara Jonggrang tersebut, Bandung Bandawasa pun marah dan mengutuk Rara Jonggrang menjadi arca terakhir dari seribu candi yang dia bangun dalam satu malam tersebut. Maka munculah sosok patung perempuan dalam salah satu arca Candi Prambanan.

Kisah tersebut adalah legenda yang dekat dengan Wisata Candi Prambanan, namun untuk sejarah asli Candi Prambanan sangat berbeda. Candi Prambanan dibangun oleh Rakai Pikatan yang saat itu adalah Raja dari Mataram Kuno dari Wangsa Sanjaya. Pembangunannya sendiri dimulai pada tahun 850, yang mana dekat dengan waktu pembangunan Borobudur.

Menurut beberapa sumber yang terangkum dalam sejarah asli Candi Prambanan, pembangunan Candi Prambanan ini adalah untuk menandingi pembangunan Borobodur kala itu. Ditambahkan menurut Prasasti Shivarga, pembangunan ini dilakukan untuk menghormati Dewa Siwa yang merupakan dewa tertinggi umat Hindu.

Namun, kejayaan Candi Prambanan pun sirna ketika pada akhirnya Mpu Sindok, Raja terakhir Mataram kuno dari Wangsa Sanjaya memindahkan pusat kerajaannya ke daerah Jawa Timur. Akibatnya, bangunan yang dipelopori oleh pendahlunya tersebut sepi ditinggalkan.

Dari sejarah asli Candi Prambanan tersebut, ejadian serupa pun juga akhirnya menimpa Candi Borobudur yang juga sempat terlupakan karena terkubur abu Gunung Merapi dan tertutup oleh semak-semak sampai Gubernur Rafles dari Belanda menemukannya kembali. Namun berbeda dengan Borobudur, Candi Prambanan tidak terkubur.

Ditilik dari sejarah asli Candi Prambanan, patung yang konon disebut sebagai patung Rara Jonggrang tersebut sebenarnya adalah patung dari Dewi Durga Mahisasuramardhani yang menurut mitos juga dipercaya sebagai jelmaan dari Rara Jonggrang. Karena ituah, salah satu dari Candi Siwa yang berada di Prambanan disebut sebagai Candi Rara Jonggraing.

Sama seperti Candi Borobudur, dari sejarah asli Candi Prambanan diketahui juga bahwa Candi Prambanan mengambil banyak Kosmologi Hindu, terutama dewa dewa yang disimbolkan berada dalam setiap candi, termasuk Candi Rara Jonggrang itu sendiri.

Terdapat tiga bagian utama dari Candi Prambanan ini yakni Plataran Njobo, Plataran Tengahan dan Plataran Njero. Tiga candi utama yang menyimbolkan tiga dewa utama dalam Agama Hindu berada di Plataran Njero yang mana menyimbolkan tempat kehidupan dimana dewa-dewi tinggal atau yang dikenal sebagai Svargaloka.

Nah itulah sekilas tentang sejarah Candi Prambanan yang terdapat dua sisi didalamnya yakni sisi sejarah yang memukau serta sisi mitos cerita yang menarik untuk diceritakan. Namun, terlepas dari hal tersebut, Candi Prambanan memang menjadi salah satu objek wisata di Jogjakarta yang tidak boleh dilewatkan ketika berkunjung.

Terkadang, di pelataran Candi Prambanan juga sering diadakan pagelaran tari Ramayana yang kisahnya juga termuat dalam gambaran Candi Prambanan. Memang sejarah Candi Prambanan ini tidak boleh terlupakan oleh bangsa kita.

Apa yang anda pikirkan ketika mendengar Candi Perambanan?? Pasti tak lepas dari kisah Roro Jonggrang dengan Bandung Bondowoso. Namun, di balik mitos tersebut, ternyata ada kisah menarik lainnya di Candi Prambanan. Hal ini diungkapkan oleh salah seorang guide lokal di Candi Prambanan. Menurutnya yang dikutip dari catatan orang Belanda bernama Bruman, dahulu orang-orang di sekitar Candi Prambanan datang ke sana untuk berdoa di patung Roro Jonggrang. Kebetulan, yang berdoa tersebut merupakan pasangan-pasangan yang ingin menikah. Namun, setelah berdoa, justru ada salah satu pasangan yang gagal menikah dan hubungannya putus di tengah jalan.

Candi Prambanan yang sudah sangat tersohor adalah candi yang bercorak agama hindu. Candi ini adalah candi hindu terbesar di Indonesia bahkan di Asia Tenggara. Pesona yang dimiliki seakan tidak pernah pudar justru semakin ramai diminati oleh wisatawan yang berkunjung di Yogyakarta. Candi Prambanan memiliki tinggi 47 meter atau lebih tinggi 5 meter dari candi Borobudur. Berada disebelah timur Yogyakarta, sejatinya tempat wisata Candi Prambanan berada di antara 2 wilayah yaitu Yogyakarta dan Jawa Tengah.

Jika berbicara mengenai sejarah, Candi Prambanan seolah sudah menjadi simbol kisah cinta yang melegenda, cerita legenda tersebut merupakan kisah cinta seorang pangeran yang bernana Bandung Bondowoso yang memiliki ketertarikan dan jatuh cinta kepada seorang putri yang bernama Roro Jonggrang. Sayangnya, sang putri Roro Jonggrang tidak mencintai Bandung Bondowoso, terjadilah cinta bertepuk sebelah tangan. Roro Jonggrang pun akhirnya mencari cara agar Bandung Bondowoso tidak lagi mencintainya, lalu Roro Jonggrang mengajukan syarat yang harus dipenuhi jika ingin tetap mencintainya, Bandung Bondowoso harus membuat 1.000 candi dalam waktu 1 malam yang terlihat mustahil. Dengan sangat yakin Bandung Bondowoso pun berani untuk menerima tantangan yang diajukan Roro Jonggrang, dengan kesaktiannya dan dibantu oleh bala bantuan dari bangsa jin akhirnya Bandung Bondowoso hampir menyelesaikan syarat yang diajukan Roro Jonggrang. Melihat hal tersebut, Roro Jonggrang panik dan mencari cara agar Bandung Bondowoso gagal menyelesaikan 1.000 candi. Sang putri pun membangunkan selir-selirnya untuk menumbuk lesung dan membangunkan ayam jago agar berkokok dan membakar api disebelah timur supaya terlihat keadaan sudah pagi.

Masih ada banyak reruntuhan candi yang amat sangat lambat pemulihan bangunannya.
Prambanan dan Borobudur adalah saksi sejarah bahwa bangsa kita di masa lalu adalah bangsa yang besar dan hebat yg harus menginspirasi bangsa Indonesia utk lebih besar dan lebih hebat lagi...

Kompleks candi ini terletak di kecamatanPrambanan, Sleman, DI Yogyakarta dan kecamatan Prambanan, Klaten, Jawa Tengah kurang lebih 17 kilometer timur lautYogyakarta, 50 kilometer barat daya Surakartadan 120 kilometer selatan Semarang, persis di perbatasan antara provinsi Jawa Tengahdan Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta.
Letaknya sangat unik, Candi Prambanan terletak di wilayah administrasi desa Bokoharjo, Prambanan, Sleman, sedangkan pintu masuk kompleks Candi Prambanan terletak di wilayah adminstrasi desa Tlogo, Prambanan,Klaten.

Candi ini adalah termasuk Situs Warisan Dunia UNESCO, candi Hindu terbesar di Indonesia, sekaligus salah satu candi terindah di Asia Tenggara. Arsitektur bangunan ini berbentuk tinggi dan ramping sesuai dengan arsitektur Hindu pada umumnya dengan candi Siwa sebagai candi utama memiliki ketinggian mencapai 47 meter menjulang di tengah kompleks gugusan candi-candi yang lebih kecil. Sebagai salah satu candi termegah di Asia Tenggara, candi Prambanan menjadi daya tarik kunjungan wisatawan dari seluruh dunia.

Prambanan Candi di Klaten yang sangat cantik. Jika ingin ke sini saya sarankan sewa guide, bayar biasanya sekitar Rp. 150.000 tapi kita bisa mendapatkan informasi, sejarah, budaya, cerita rakyat yang terkait dengan candi Prambanan. Ada guide yang bernama Pak Doel, cukup informatif dan beliau bisa bantu kita untuk jadi juru foto. Biasanya guide tau spot-spot foto dan angle yang bagus loh.

Saya sarankan juga sore hari jika ingin ke sini. Selain tidak panas, kita bisa menikmati sunset yang sangat indah. Ada tempat beli oleh-oleh dan pedagang-pedagang di sekitar sana, kalau sore mereka biasanya jual lebih murah.

Candi Prambanan atau Candi Roro Jonggrang (Hanacaraka:??????????????, Candhi Prambanan) adalah kompleks candi Hindu terbesar di Indonesia yang dibangun pada abad ke-9 masehi. Candi ini dipersembahkan untuk Trimurti, tiga dewa utama Hindu yaitu Brahma sebagai dewa pencipta, Wishnu sebagai dewa pemelihara, dan Siwa sebagai dewa pemusnah. Berdasarkan prasasti Siwagrha nama asli kompleks candi ini adalah Siwagrha (bahasa Sanskerta yang bermakna 'Rumah Siwa'), dan memang di garbagriha (ruang utama) candi ini bersemayam arca Siwa Mahadewa setinggi tiga meter yang menujukkan bahwa di candi ini dewa Siwa lebih diutamakan.
candinya sangat bagus.. ada 2 candi yg berdekatan dengan candi prambanan. untuk harga tiketnya 50rb hari liburan.tapi entah untuk hari biasa brpa harga tiket masuknya.
Tempatnya seru untuk mengenal sejarah untuk anak-anak dan banyak spot foto menarik lainnya. Pokoknya cocok banget deh kalau ada di YOGYAKARTA mampir kesini..!!!

Warisan budaya yg bagus dan indah..sangat cocok untuk liburan bersama keluarga tercinta
Bisa mengenalkan sejarah kepada anak cucu kita
Udah beberapa kali ke sini...bagus...spot foto selfi,bersih,nyaman

Again,,,yg ke 2x akhirnya pake guide.... Malah puas bgt deh.. guide nya ramah, ditunjukkin spot photo yg bagus pula....anak2 juga ga ngeluh lelah... pokoknya wajib pake guide...jd bisa kesemua candi...
Tiket masuk 50 rb, bisa berfoto di manapun, Subhanallah sekali candinyaa, takjub

Candi Prambanan adalah tempat wisata yang banyak di minati oleh beberapa negara seperti negara tetangga bahkan dari benua Eropa dan Australia sekalipun. Karena candi Prambanan merupakan keajaiban dunia yang ada di Indonesia seperti Candi Borobudur. Candi Prambanan terletak di Yogyakarta dan candi Prambanan sangat bagus di kunjungi pada waktu sore hari karena keindahan sunset nya dan suasana nya yang udah agak sepi kalau hari kerja itu menjadikan tempat photo shoot yang bagus dan keren. Apalagi saat akan tenggelam nya matahari itu saat yang bagus untuk mengambil gambar. Tidak lupa lagi candi Prambanan adalah candi yang dibangun dan biasanya di anut oleh agama Hindu.
Kalo anda lagi di jogja belum kesini, berarti anda harus balik lagi hehe. I love the place!

Letaknya sangat unik, Candi Prambanan terletak di wilayah administrasi desa Bokoharjo, Prambanan, Sleman, sedangkan pintu masuk kompleks Candi Prambanan terletak di wilayah adminstrasi desa Tlogo, Prambanan, Klaten.

Candi ini adalah termasuk Situs Warisan Dunia UNESCO, candi Hindu terbesar di Indonesia, sekaligus salah satu candi terindah di Asia Tenggara. Arsitektur bangunan ini berbentuk tinggi dan ramping sesuai dengan arsitektur Hindu pada umumnya dengan candi Siwa sebagai candi utama memiliki ketinggian mencapai 47 meter menjulang di tengah kompleks gugusan candi-candi yang lebih kecil.Sebagai salah satu candi termegah di Asia Tenggara, candi Prambanan menjadi daya tarik kunjungan wisatawan dari seluruh dunia.

Menurut prasasti Siwagrha, candi ini mulai dibangun pada sekitar tahun 850 masehi oleh Rakai Pikatan, dan terus dikembangkan dan diperluas oleh Balitung Maha Sambu, pada masa kerajaan Medang Mataram.

Sangat disarankan untuk menambah edukasi dan wawasan serta jangan lupa untuk menyewa pemandu untuk mengetahui jalan ceritanya.

Salah satu candi peninggalan sejarah di Indonesia, yang mana memiliki komplek yang cukup luas. Tempat yang bagus untuk berlibur bersama keluarga, karna terdapat paket wisata mengunjungi candi lainnya juga.
Sudah berkali kali datang kesini tapi tidak pernah bosan menikmati keagungan mahakarya leluhur yang satu ini. Wajib dikunjungi untuk menambah ilmu pengetahuan dan sejarah peradaban.
Saya pernah kesini.. udaranya sejuk, tempatnya pun indah... tempat bersejarah yang harus kalian ketahui.. pembangunannya pun indah.. I Love Prambanan.

Terakhir ke Candi Prambanan tahun 2000, dan selama ini hanya numpang lewat saja bila akan ke Klaten atau Jogja. Fasilitas sudah lumayan lengkap, namun masih sangat banyak pengunjung yang merokok di dalam batas wilayah Candi dan banyak pengunjung yang membuang sampah sembarangan. Sarana tempat sampah dan MCK juga masih sangat kurang.

Namun tidak banyak tempat berteduh membuat tempat ini sangat panas, serta lokasi toiletnya lumayan jauh dari situs wisata.

Prambanan adalah candi Hindu terbesar dan termegah yang pernah dibangun di Jawa kuno, pembangunan candi Hindu kerajaan ini dimulai oleh Rakai Pikatan sebagai tandingan candi Buddha Borobudur dan juga candi Sewuyang terletak tak jauh dari Prambanan. Beberapa sejarawan lama menduga bahwa pembangunan candi agung Hindu ini untuk menandai kembali berkuasanya keluarga Sanjaya atas Jawa, hal ini terkait teori wangsa kembar berbeda keyakinan yang saling bersaing; yaitu wangsa Sanjaya penganut Hindu dan wangsa Sailendra penganut Buddha. Pastinya, dengan dibangunnya candi ini menandai bahwa Hinduisme aliran Saiwa kembali mendapat dukungan keluarga kerajaan, setelah sebelumnya wangsa Sailendra cenderung lebih mendukung Buddha aliran Mahayana. Hal ini menandai bahwa kerajaan Medang beralih fokus dukungan keagamaanya, dari Buddha Mahayana ke pemujaan terhadap Siwa.

Bangunan ini pertama kali dibangun sekitar tahun 850 Masehi oleh Rakai Pikatan dan secara berkelanjutan disempurnakan dan diperluas oleh Raja Lokapala dan raja Balitung Maha Sambu. Berdasarkan prasasti Siwagrhaberangka tahun 856 M, bangunan suci ini dibangun untuk memuliakan dewa Siwa, dan nama asli bangunan ini dalam bahasa Sanskerta adalah Siwagrha (Sanskerta:Shiva-grha yang berarti: 'Rumah Siwa') atau Siwalaya (Sanskerta:Shiva-laya yang berarti: 'Ranah Siwa' atau 'Alam Siwa').[6] Dalam prasasti ini disebutkan bahwa saat pembangunan candi Siwagrha tengah berlangsung, dilakukan juga pekerjaan umum perubahan tata air untuk memindahkan aliran sungai di dekat candi ini. Sungai yang dimaksud adalah sungai Opak yang mengalir dari utara ke selatan sepanjang sisi barat kompleks candi Prambanan. Sejarawan menduga bahwa aslinya aliran sungai ini berbelok melengkung ke arah timur, dan dianggap terlalu dekat dengan candi sehingga erosi sungai dapat membahayakan konstruksi candi. Proyek tata air ini dilakukan dengan membuat sodetan sungai baru yang memotong lengkung sungai dengan poros utara-selatan sepanjang dinding barat di luar kompleks candi. Bekas aliran sungai asli kemudian ditimbun untuk memberikan lahan yang lebih luas bagi pembangunan deretan candi perwara (candi pengawal atau candi pendamping).

Candi Prambanan atau dikenal juga dengan nama Candi Roro Jonggrang, merupakan komplek candi Hindu terbesar di Indonesia. Komplek candi ini sudah mengalami beberapa kali renovasi. Kini wajah candi Prambanan telah terlihat sangat cantik. Di depan komplek candi, dibangun panggung pentas sendratari Ramayana dan Taman Wisata Prambanan yang semakin mempercantik wajah komplek Prambanan. Setiap saat komplek candi ini ramai dikunjungi oleh wisatawan baik domestik maupun manca negara.

Setelah menikmati keindahan komplek candi utama,kita bisa menikmati candi - candi yang letaknya agak jauh (candi Bubrah,candi Lumbung dan candi Sewu ) dengan naik kereta mini,golf car / menyewa sepeda dengan tarif 10 s/d 20 ribu rupiah. 
Masing - masing candi mempunyai keunikan dan keindahan yang tiada duanya.

Candi Prambanan terletak di Jogjakarta

Kelebihan Candi Prambanan : 
Merupakan salah satu aset indonesia, merupakan salah satu bukti sejarah peradaban Umat Hindhu,  banyak dikunjungi oleh pecinta wisata baik mancanegara maupun Indonesia. Area tempat yang nyaman untuk mengabadikan moment, merupakan tempat belajar untuk mengenal sejarah Prambanan (diperlukan guide ). Dapat berkeliling beberapa candi yang bersebelahan dengan Candi Prambanan menggunakan mobil sewa,  Pengurus/Petugas ramah-ramah, harga tiket masuk cukup  murah, terdapat beraneka macam ole-oleh khas Jogja dan miniatur Prambanan disekitaran pintu keluar Prambanan dengan harga yang sangat terjangkau.

Kekurangan :
Beberapa bagian dari candi tidak orisinil lagi akibat kenakalan dan perbuatan oknum.
Pertama kali kesini, luar biasa bangeeeeetttt~ capek tapi terbayar lunas dengan kemegahan di depan mata. Serasa berada di dunia dan masa lalu

Tempat yang bagus buat wisata ,mengenal sejarah budaya bangsa,ada tempat bermain,terutama sm yg suka foto selfie mantap,apalagi klo mo ikut paket wisata candi prambanan,candi boko,candi ijo dll akan  lebih seru lagi.

Sebuah situs peninggalan kerajaan mataram hindu,yang masih tersisa dan dipelihara dengan baik sebagai cagar budaya dan menjadi salah satu cagar budaya UNESCO.Sangat rekomended untuk wisata edukasi dikota pendidikan

Candi prambanan merupakan salah satu candi yang banyak dikunjungi oleh wisatawan lokal maupun mancanegara waktu terbaik untuk mengunjungi candi ini adalah sore hari saat matahari mulai terbenam, kebersihan candi ini cukup terjaga kecuali toilet yang kurang terawat, kesadaran pengunjung perlu ditingkatkan untuk tidak merusak maupun membuang sampah dicandi tersebut.
Tempatnya indah dan banyak wisatawan dari berbagai negara bangunannya sangat kuat meskipun sudah bertahun tahun lamahnya

ini salah satu tempat yang sering saya kunjungi.. candi prambanan. tiket masuknya murah cuma 40rb per orang, tapi jangan lupa bawa topi/payung krn panas.. tempatnya keren abis dengan view pemandangan yang eksotis..

Lebih enjoy di sini daripada di candi lain.

Batu2 reruntuhan dan rerumputan hijau menambah khas candi ini.
Pengelolaan juga udah cukup bagus.
Toilet masih kurang sering dibersihkan.
Always be a beatiful temple. Banyak candi yg bisa dikunjungi, apalagi sambil naik sepeda
Sangat indah, bersih dan menarik, tolong kalau kesini sapahnya jangan d buang sembarangan dan jangan manjat d candi:( cintailah tempat in agak cucu dan cicitmu dapat melihat
masih semegah dulu walaupun pernah di guncang gempa 5,2 sk ada bukti bisu dari bangunan candi bagian stupa atasnya yg jatuh tapi masih mempesona

candi nya bagus, dan pemandangannya keren untuk dinikmati dan untuk foto-foto.

anak kecil dan orang tua juga masih nyaman dna enak untuk jalan kaki nya.

Salah satu destinasi yang wajib disinggahi jika sedang berkunjung ke Jogjakarta.
Akan lebih puas menikmati kawasan Candi Prambanan ini jika berkunjung di hari kerja alias bukan di hari libur apalagi season liburan, karena pastinya kawasan ini akan penuh sesak dengan pengunjung.
Areal parkir cukup luas, tiket masuk kendaraan cukup terjangkau, tiket masuk areal candi per orang Rp. 50.000.
Areal candi cukup luas, bersih dan asri, lengkap dengan berbagai fasilitas. Cocok sebagai destinasi liburan keluarga.

Maa sya Allah, lebih gagah, cantik, ukiran batunya detail, candi nya lebih banyak dari Borobudur. Masih ga kebayang kok bisa manusia dahulu bikin bangunan sekokoh dan se cantik ini, keren pake banget.
Candi yg tertelak di antara Jateng dan DIY ini memang sangat megah dan menawan, yuk kita mulai mencintai budaya kita dengan berkujung ke tempat2 bersejarah di Indonesia
Salah satu tempat wisata di jogja yang terkenal, kalo mau kesini disarankan membawa payung atau seea payung ditemoat, karena kalau siang panas banget
Wisata budaya, sebaiknya ditemani guide agar mendapat informasi lengkap, kunjungi juga  candi pendamping, luangkan waktu panjang agar bisa meresapi kunjungan tempat bersejarah
Pergi kesini bersama keluarga.. .jadi semacam. Kembali ke legenda loro jongrang. . Tapi apapun itu yg mbangun tempat ini sangat luar biasa.  Walau capek jalan ngelilingi candi demi candi terbayar. .

Tempat sejarah yang wajib kamu kunjungi kalau ke Yogyakarta. cukup dengan bayar 50rb rupiah kamu bisa menikmati pemandangan yang disajikan di candi maupun sekitar candi. selain bisa berfoto di candi terdapat juga beberapa spot foto yang bagus disekitaran candi.
Dua kali kesini dalam jarak dua tahun harganya relatif naik signifikan ya. Untuk candi nya masih ya masih terjaga dan harganya saja mungkin yg relatif cukup tinggi.

Candi Prambanan adalah sebuah situs kuno yang ada di indonesia. Dan sebagai warga negara indonesia kita wajib tahu bahwasan nya Candi prambanan ini adalah sebagai bukti sejarah bahwa di indonesia pernah berdiri kerajaan kerajaan yang hebat dan terkenal.
Candi prambanan juga adalah bukti sejarah yang tidak bisa di pungkiri lagi, bahwa sebelum adanya Agama Islam, kristen dan agama lain nya nenek moyang kita adalah penganut Agama Hindu.

Terakhir kesini 25thn yang lalu saat rekreasi smp, banyak sekali yang berubah.. parkiran jadi luas, kemirin kesitu pas siang siang jadi oanas banget, pastikan bawa payung/topi kalau ga mau kena heat shock
Tempatnya luas, dekat dari loket. Ada juga tempat khusus untuk berfoto. Dtg kesini cocoknya pada saat terang.

Salah satu wisata sejarah di jogja. Yg jelas pengelolaan sdh sangat baik dibandingkan waktu sy berkunjung duluuuuuu. Sdh ada wahana bermain untuk anak. Sudah ada wahana tambahan bagi mereka yg suka ber swafoto. Lokasi cukup teduh, tp ada beberapa lokasi yg panas khusunya di lokasi candi. Jd disarankan pakai topi atau payung. Untuk beli oleh2 tdk usah khawatir krn disediakan lokasi belanja oleh2 yg harganya sangat bersaing dg tempat lain
Kalau kesini mndingan pas cuaca pas deh. Jangan pas panas karena di dalem bakal kepanasan parah, jgn pas mendung ya ntr ujan lah. Pagi deh, sebelum matahari muncul.
Sekarang udah dikelola lebih baik. Namun, harga tiket lumayan mahal.

Candi Prambanan merupakan situs warisan bersejarah yang perlu dilestarikan keberadaannya ,  nuansa alam nya sangat indah apalagi mudah di jangkau dari rumah ku dengan jalan kaki jarak sekitar  500 meter ,

Kompleks candi prambanan. Seru banget! Bersih dan terawat. Kesana pas bukan musim libur jadi sepi. Sayang banget candinya ada yang lagi direnov. Ada kafe juga jualan jamu dan surabi tradisional. Panas terik tapi seru!

Destinasi yang wajib dikunjungi bila ke Yogyakarta. Meski letaknya bukan di DIY, tapi orang-orang terlanjur mengenal candi bercorak Hindu ini sebagai bagian dari kota Pelajar. Selalu ramai terutama musim liburan. Ada beberapa candi besar di dalamnya. Selain itu bisa juga menikmati sendratari Ramayana setiap malam bulan purnama. Fasilitas lengkap dan nyaman. Jangan lupa beli oleh-oleh khas Yogya di pasar yang ada di sepanjang jalan keluar candi.
Tempatnya bagus,aku dan teman temanku ingin pergi ke sana lg,I WANT TO GO THERE AGAIN

Gugusan candi Prambanan diambil karna terletak didaerah Prambanan dan berkaitan dgn legenda yg menceritakan "Loro Jonggrang" putri Prabu Boko.  Candi utama terdiri atas 2 deret yg saling berhadapan, deret pertama Candi Siwa,  Candi Wisnu, Candi Brahma. Deret kedua Candi Nandi, Candi Angsa, Candi Garuda. Pada ujung lorong memisahkan ada Candi Apit.  4 Candi Kelir dan 4 Candi Sudut. keseluruhan 240 Candi

Candi yang memiliki kisah sejarah dalam pembangunannya, baik itu legenda atau tidak, situs cagar budaya ini merupakan wisata yang sangat populer di daerah DIY Yogyakarta. Karena jarak yang cukup dekat dekat kota Jogja dan fasilitas umum untuk kesana juga banyak.

Sebuah situs cagar budaya yang sangat terkenal dengan kearifan lokalnya, tempatnya lebih enak sekarang, cukup rimbun, dan lumayan capek juga jika kita memutari kawasan candi. Dan sekarang lebih lengkap.

Kota Terdekat dari Prambanan adalah Yogyakarta (17 km barat daya) dan Klaten (3 km utara). Candi Prambanan mudah diakses karena berada di jalan raya Solo - Yogya. Dari kota Yogyakarta anda dapat menggunakan transportasi umum Transjogja yang berhenti di halte pasar Prambanan. Semua bus antar kota jurusan Solo juga bisa mengantar anda sampai depan candi Prambanan.

Candi prambanan, wisata keluarga Di daerah jogja. Biaya masuk 50rb/orang. Parkiran Luas enak kalu bawa Mobil disini. Tutup Di jam 17.30 seperti tempat wisata umumnya. Tersedia juga souvenirs khas prambanan di arah keluar Candi.

4. Bagi pihak manajemen flexibel sedikit jangan terlalu egois di musim hujan

Salah satu candi legendaris di Jawa Tengah. Candinya sudah beberapa kali di renovasi. Kami sekeluarga menikmati keindahan candi ini. Hanya saja fasilitas yang masih kurang. Banyak wisatawan yang masih suka duduk di atas batu yang sebetulnya jangan duduk disana.

Di kompleks Candi Prambanan, pengunjung direkomendasikan untuk mengunjungi 3 candi yang sangat besar, yaitu: Candi Siwa, Wisnu, dan Brahma. Di dalam candi-candi tersebut terdapat ruangan yang berisi arca.
 
Candi Prambanan dihiasi relief yang menceritakan kisah Ramayana. Relief ini dipahat pada dinding sebelah dalam pagar sepanjang lorong galeri yang mengelilingi candi utama. Pengunjung dapat melihat seluruh kisah ini dengan mengitari candi searah jarum jam, dimulai dari sisi timur candi Siwa sampai ke candi Brahma.
